Literature.Title: Non-toxic antimicrobial peptide Hm-AMP2 from leech metagenome
Literature.Author: Grafskaia EN, Pavlova ER, Latsis IA, Malakhova MV, Ivchenkov DV, Bashkirov PV, Kot EF, Mineev KS, Arseniev AS, Klinov DV, Lazarev VN

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis 168 HT(MIC=>100µM),Staphylococcus aureus ST88(MIC=>100µM),Staphylococcus haemolyticus 527(MIC=>100µM),Mycobacterium smegmatis mc2-155(MIC=>100µM),Escherichia coli MG1655(MIC=>100µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>100µM)
